name: Jinsei Owata no Daibouken 2
summary: A sequel to Jinsei Owata no Daibouken, set in a world of ASCII art that is disappearing along with support for Adobe Flash Player. It's gameplay is quite similar to the first game and was launched aiming to be the last flash game.
